data.persona: The wildlife here is varied. We have everything from toads to dragons in the realm. Keep a wary eye when you are walking alone.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a moss and a ship here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will put apples, acorns, and other edible food in the bag.
data.mid_motivation: I will bury my stash of bag in the food in the ground and mark it so I know where it is.
data.long_motivation: I will come back in the winter months to dig up the bag and the food so I can eat in the winter.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop apples on the ground from trying to carry too many.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the ship to get the bag.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to the forest to find food.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: drop the bag of food in a hole in the ground, cover it, and mark it for winter.
